# isISOLanguage

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether this language code is in the list of ISO-defined languages.

## Declaration

```swift
var isISOLanguage: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The following code snippet illustrates use of the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Locale/LanguageCode-swift.struct/isISOLanguage] value.

```swift
let enIsISO = Locale.LanguageCode("en").isISOLanguage // true
let gibberishIsISO = Locale.LanguageCode("gibberish").isISOLanguage // false
```

## Examining language code properties

- **identifier**: The identifier used to create the language code.

items.description: The identifier used to create the language code.
